meanings.definition: A signal to wake up or rise, typically played on a bugle.
meanings.sent1: The reveilles in the morning help everyone wake up.
meanings.sent2: The camp was filled with the sound of reveilles at dawn.
meanings.sent3: The reveilles on the bugle always make me jump out of bed.
meanings.sent4: The reveilles echoed through the valley, stirring everyone from their slumber.
meanings.sent5: As the reveilles played, the soldiers sprang into action.
